A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had some issues with The Force Awakens\, but at least it had a decent story and really interesting characters. It also had a nice setup for a second movie. So of course the new guy in charge had to drop all of that for a plot that makes zero sense\, a complete waste of interesting characters\, humiliating the characters of color and throwing them to a meaningless subplot and make the space nazi seem sympathetic because he's just a sad little boy who didn't get enough attention from mommy and daddy (even though he's 30). As I heard someone say (I forgot who it was) it's amazing how so much stuff happens and yet pretty much nothing changes. At least the prequels had heart\, but this? A complete and total waste of time and money. What a disappointment!
